**Date: December 09, 2021**\
**Time: 10:00-11:00am PT** (UTC-7)\
**Where: Zoom**\
**Free event, registration through eventbrite.**
[**Video Recording**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rsd4z8kXJgo)

Please join us for a conversation with [Abby Cabunoc Mayes](https://twitter.com/abbycabs) and [Chad Sansing](https://twitter.com/chadsansing) of Mozilla about open leadership, the Mozilla Open Leaders program, and how it was designed and iterated. We'll discuss ideas and lessons learned from Moz OL, as well as from Openscapes, [Open Life Science](https://openlifesci.org/), [Open Post Academics](https://openpostac.org/), and Open Hardware, and invite others to share as well!


![](moz-movement-building.png){width="45%" fig-align="center"}

[**Chad Sansing**](https://about.me/chadsansing) is a program manager on the MozFest team at Mozilla. He works on facilitation, leadership, and movement-building with our internet health and trustworthy AI communities.
